OPENLEDGER ?
OpenLedger is a data blockchain for AI, powering decentralized trust infrastructure to create payable AI models and agents.

https://openledger.xyz/

PAYABLE AI
Payable models are specialized language models capable of explaining and attributing back to the data contributors. This methodology ensures transparency, enabling the creation of fair models.

DATANET
Datanets are our specialized data sourcing networks designed to support our payable models. These networks can be built by companies or subject matter experts, ensuring high-quality, domain-specific data tailored to the needs of our models.

AGENTS
